analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/41/0xc9ca42c58d32395d42da38663193312290167bb8.sol:
	Contract Citrium has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xc9ca42c58d32395d42da38663193312290167bb8.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xc9ca42c58d32395d42da38663193312290167bb8.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
